title: STRONG BODY REACTION WITH NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS 1
description:

Dr. Marco Paret is the world-leading authority in this field and his masterclasses are suitable for professional hypnotherapists and for people who want to discover the non-verbal hypnosis world.
